title: Rajarata University opts for online lectures
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Rajarata University has decided to conduct lectures online for a period of two weeks from tomorrow (20).
However, the Vice Chancellor of the University, Prof. Sanjeewani Ginigaddara stated that it has been decided to continue all the examinations as usual, without any changes.

Meanwhile, the Minister of Education Dr. Susil Premajayantha stated to News 1st that the Vice Chancellors of Universities have been empowered to decide on the conduct of academic activities at universities within the next week.
